Class RecordCGAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<RecordCGAdapter.RecordCGViewholder>
      • com.example.mdbook.RecordCGAdapter

  • public class RecordCGAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<RecordCGAdapter.RecordCGViewholder>
    Record Adapter for viewing records in ListRecordCGActivity for the caregiver
    See Also:
    ListRecordsCGActivity, Record
